Properties.commandText:
SELECT [s].[Id], [s].[AllergyId], [s].[BackgroundImageUrl], [s].[BottomColor], [s].[Calories], [s].[Carbs], [s].[CardLabelsAr], [s].[CardLabelsEn], [s].[CategoryId], [s].[DeliveryTime], [s].[DescriptionAr], [s].[DescriptionEn], [s].[ImageUrl], [s].[IngredientsAr], [s].[IngredientsEn], [s].[LikeCount], [s].[NameAr], [s].[NameEn], [s].[Protein], [s].[SortInCategory], [s].[ThumbnailUrl], [s].[TopColor], [s].[VideoUrl], [s].[Id0], [s0].[Id], [s0].[ItemId], [s0].[ToppingGroupId], [s0].[Id0], [s0].[IsRequired], [s0].[MaxAllowedOptions], [s0].[MinAllowedOptions], [s0].[SortOrder], [s0].[TitleAr], [s0].[TitleEn], [s0].[Type], [s0].[Id1], [s0].[ImageUrl], [s0].[IsAvailable], [s0].[IsDefault], [s0].[MaxAllowedQuantity], [s0].[NameAr], [s0].[NameEn], [s0].[Price], [s0].[ToppingGroupId0], [s].[ImageUrl0], [s].[NameAr0], [s].[NameEn0], [s1].[ID], [s1].[BasePrice], [s1].[BranchId], [s1].[CashbackPercent], [s1].[DiscountPercent], [s1].[IsAvailable], [s1].[ItemId], [s1].[MaxOrderQuantity], [s1].[PriceWithoutDiscount], [s1].[SalesCount], [s1].[Stock], [s1].[Id0], [s1].[AddressAr], [s1].[AddressEn], [s1].[AreaId], [s1].[BranchImages], [s1].[DeliveryFee], [s1].[GovernorateId], [s1].[IsBusy], [s1].[IsOpen], [s1].[MaxAllowedOrdersInDay], [s1].[MaxCashOnDeliveryAllowed], [s1].[NameAr], [s1].[NameEn], [s1].[Phone]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [i].[Id], [i].[AllergyId], [i].[BackgroundImageUrl], [i].[BottomColor], [i].[Calories], [i].[Carbs], [i].[CardLabelsAr], [i].[CardLabelsEn], [i].[CategoryId], [i].[DeliveryTime], [i].[DescriptionAr], [i].[DescriptionEn], [i].[ImageUrl], [i].[IngredientsAr], [i].[IngredientsEn], [i].[LikeCount], [i].[NameAr], [i].[NameEn], [i].[Protein], [i].[SortInCategory], [i].[ThumbnailUrl], [i].[TopColor], [i].[VideoUrl], [a].[Id] AS [Id0], [a].[ImageUrl] AS [ImageUrl0], [a].[NameAr] AS [NameAr0], [a].[NameEn] AS [NameEn0]
    FROM [Items] AS [i]
    LEFT JOIN [Allergy] AS [a] ON [i].[AllergyId] = [a].[Id]
    WHERE [i].[Id] = @__itemId_0
) AS [s]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [i0].[Id], [i0].[ItemId], [i0].[ToppingGroupId], [t].[Id] AS [Id0], [t].[IsRequired], [t].[MaxAllowedOptions], [t].[MinAllowedOptions], [t].[SortOrder], [t].[TitleAr], [t].[TitleEn], [t].[Type], [t0].[Id] AS [Id1], [t0].[ImageUrl], [t0].[IsAvailable], [t0].[IsDefault], [t0].[MaxAllowedQuantity], [t0].[NameAr], [t0].[NameEn], [t0].[Price], [t0].[ToppingGroupId] AS [ToppingGroupId0]
    FROM [ItemToppingGroups] AS [i0]
    INNER JOIN [ToppingGroups] AS [t] ON [i0].[ToppingGroupId] = [t].[Id]
    LEFT JOIN [ToppingOptions] AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[ToppingGroupId]
) AS [s0] ON [s].[Id] = [s0].[ItemId]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [b].[ID], [b].[BasePrice], [b].[BranchId], [b].[CashbackPercent], [b].[DiscountPercent], [b].[IsAvailable], [b].[ItemId], [b].[MaxOrderQuantity], [b].[PriceWithoutDiscount], [b].[SalesCount], [b].[Stock], [b0].[Id] AS [Id0], [b0].[AddressAr], [b0].[AddressEn], [b0].[AreaId], [b0].[BranchImages], [b0].[DeliveryFee], [b0].[GovernorateId], [b0].[IsBusy], [b0].[IsOpen], [b0].[MaxAllowedOrdersInDay], [b0].[MaxCashOnDeliveryAllowed], [b0].[NameAr], [b0].[NameEn], [b0].[Phone]
    FROM [BranchItems] AS [b]
    INNER JOIN [Branches] AS [b0] ON [b].[BranchId] = [b0].[Id]
) AS [s1] ON [s].[Id] = [s1].[ItemId]
ORDER BY [s].[Id], [s].[Id0], [s0].[Id], [s0].[Id0], [s0].[Id1], [s1].[ID]
